headline: 5 Insightful Analyst Questions From Aflac’s Q4 Earnings Call
summary: Aflac’s fourth quarter saw a positive market response despite missing Wall Street’s revenue and non-GAAP profit expectations, with management attributing performance to product launches and shifting sales dynamics across Japan and the U.S. The Japan business delivered a notable 15.7% sales increase driven by new cancer and medical products, while the U.S. segment benefitted from persistent premium growth and disciplined underwriting. CEO Daniel Amos highlighted that strong persistency and sales
